"The Challenge Mile Shop":
"About the Challenge Mile Shop

Here, you can purchase items using the Challenge Miles that you earn for completing Challenge Quests.

You can purchase items from the Goods List by moving the cursor up and down, changing the number on the item with the left and right arrows, then selecting \"Buy\".
